did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
University of Virginia Honor Committee Case Files
1961-1974

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: No access to this material by anyone other than members of the Honor Committee or its secretary, and then only with written permission of the president of the Honor Committee or his properly authorized representative.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Honor Committee Case Files, Accession #RG-23/1/1.742, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was received as an archival transfer on May 24, 1974.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of case files of the Honor Committee.
